derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Christian Latin condolere, from con- 'with' + dolere 'grieve, suffer'

means.word_mean: 1. express one's sympathetic grief, on the occasion of someone's death;

stems_affixes.word_buile: dole悲伤+ful充满……的→adj.忧愁的,消沉的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 懒惰, 好逸恶劳, 懒散
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+dole悲伤+ence表名词→[失败了]不知道悲伤→懒惰
con共同+dole悲伤→共同悲伤→哀悼
